hero.title: Kilo mystery boxes from legal stock. Clear prices, real surprise.
hero.subtitle: Choose Standard or Premium, select the weight and add to cart. Kilomistery quality: crafted design, transparency, traceability.
how.title: How it works
how.step1: Order Standard or Premium and choose the weight.
how.step2: Random selection from legal stock (with invoice).
how.step3: Net weigh, seal with batch ID and date.
returns.title: Returns & Refunds
returns.point1: Right of withdrawal within 14 days of delivery.
returns.point2: Only for the sealed box in original condition.
returns.point3: If the seal is broken or items are handled beyond necessary, refund may be reduced or refused.
returns.point4: Return costs borne by the customer unless transport damage/error.
cart.title: Cart
transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.text: We buy stock from legitimate B2B marketplaces with documentation. Checks to exclude illegal/counterfeit items. No third-party trademarks used.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy matters. We process personal data in compliance with EU GDPR (Reg. 2016/679) and applicable Italian law.

dataCollected.title: Data we collect
dataCollected.body: We collect name, email, shipping/billing address, order details, and payment information (handled securely by providers). We may collect technical data (IP, device, cookies) for security and analytics.

purpose.title: Purposes
purpose.body: Order fulfillment and shipping, customer support, legal/accounting obligations, fraud prevention, aggregated analytics to improve services, and—if you consent—marketing communications.

legalBasis.title: Legal bases
legalBasis.body: Contract performance (orders), legal obligations, legitimate interest (security & improvements), consent (marketing).

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.body: We use technical cookies and, with your consent, analytics/marketing cookies. You can manage them via the banner or your browser settings.

retention.title: Retention
retention.body: We keep data only as long as needed for the stated purposes or required by law (e.g., tax/accounting).

rights.title: Your rights
rights.body: You can exercise access, rectification, erasure, restriction, objection, portability, and consent withdrawal by contacting us.

contacts.title: Privacy contacts
contacts.body: For privacy requests, write to: support@kilomistery.com

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: These terms govern the use of the website and the purchase of products. By placing an order you fully accept them.

contract.title: Contract & orders
contract.body: The contract is concluded upon payment and order confirmation. We may refuse/cancel orders in case of anomalies or stock issues.

prices.title: Prices & payments
prices.body: Prices are in EUR and include VAT unless otherwise stated. Payments are handled by secure providers (e.g., Stripe).

shipping.title: Shipping & delivery
shipping.body: We ship with tracked couriers. Indicative timings are shown in the Shipping page. Delays not attributable to the seller do not entitle compensation.

mystery.title: Mystery products
mystery.body: Boxes are sealed and sold as mystery items: contents are a surprise from lawful stock. Images are illustrative.

returns.title: Returns & withdrawal
returns.body: See the Returns page for our policy. For defects or non-conformities, contact us within the statutory timeframe.

liability.title: Liability
liability.body: We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages. In any case, liability is capped at the order value.

law.title: Governing law
law.body: Italian law applies. Competent court: consumer’s court where applicable.

returns.title: Return Policy
returns.intro: Our boxes are sealed and sold as mystery items. Therefore, returns are not accepted except for defects, shipping damage, or legal non-conformity.

noReturns.title: No returns for content
noReturns.body: The mystery nature means contents are not customizable; returns for mere dissatisfaction are not accepted.

defects.title: Defective or damaged items
defects.body: If your box arrives damaged or defective, contact us within 48 hours with photos and order number. We will assess replacement or partial/full refund.

process.title: How to request
process.body: Email support@kilomistery.com with order number, description of the issue, and clear photos of packaging and contents.

shipping.title: Shipping Policy
shipping.intro: We ship across Italy and the EU with tracked couriers. You’ll receive tracking once the order is handed to the carrier.

times.title: Delivery times
times.body: Italy: typically 24–72 business hours; EU: 3–6 days. Holidays or remote areas may take longer.

costs.title: Shipping costs
costs.body: Calculated at checkout based on weight, destination, and any promotions.

packaging.title: Packaging & traceability
packaging.body: Each box has a seal with lot ID, net weight, and date. Reinforced packaging and full tracking.
